# GraphQL Apollo Server Example

This example shows how to implement a **GraphQL server with TypeScript** based on [Prisma Client](https://github.com/prisma/prisma2/blob/master/docs/prisma-client-js/api.md), [apollo-server](https://www.apollographql.com/docs/apollo-server/) and [Nexus Schema](https://nexusjs.org/#/components/schema/about). It is based on a SQLite database, you can find the database file with some dummy data at [`./prisma/dev.db`](./prisma/dev.db).

**INLINE(../\_setup-1.md)**
cd prisma-examples/typescript/graphql-apollo-server
**INLINE(../\_setup-2.md)**

**INLINE(../\_start-graphql-server.md)**
